Docs.summary: Contains classes that support SQL Server-specific functionality.

remarks.format: For information about the functionality of the classes within this namespace, see [Enumerating Instances of SQL Server (ADO.NET)](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server) and [Query Notifications in SQL Server](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server).
